all the associated costs are deducted. However Simon Cowell has insisted that all the cash will go directly to the winner and not to label staff. During a conference call with reporters he said: I'm nervous but I'm also confident that it was the right thing to do. I think it should be a life-changing prize and just to be clear, this isn't a dressed-up$ 5 million. This is a guaranteed$ 5 million payable to the winner. The recording, marketing and video costs are completely separate to that. It will be paid over five years at$ 1 million a year.
